verbs.description: “ [ARG0: The mob] [V: takes] [ARG1: the Fifth] . [ARGM-ADV: If you 're innocent] , why are you taking the Fifth Amendment ? ” Those are the words of popular vote loser Donald Trump , back in 2015 when
